alert.note: Alert for Hunt; Rockwall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 22 at 12:50PM CST until January 24 at 5:27PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Cowleech Fork Sabine River At Greenville affecting Hunt County. South Fork Sabine River Near Quinlan affecting Hunt and Rockwall Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING TO WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Fork Sabine River near Quinlan. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning to Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Minor out of bank flooding will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 AM CST Monday the stage was 4.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to flood stage tomorrow morning. It will then fall to 14.4 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will rise above flood stage again tomorrow afternoon to 16.0 feet early Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage again early Wednesday morning. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
